item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • item.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisitableItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LaunchableItem, LightGrenade, Teleport

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements VisitableItem
    Parent class for all sorts of items.
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere, Vincent Reniers and Stefan Pante

    • Method Detail

      • notifyUse

        public void notifyUse()
        Notifies the item that it has been used. No specific operation is needed at this level. Inheriting item may determine if it needs to handle internal operations if it is beeing used.

      • notifyPickUp

        public void notifyPickUp()
        Notifies the item that it has been picked up. No specific operation is needed at this level. Inheriting item may determine if it needs to handle internal operations if it is beeing picked up.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
